text: The Hanteng X7 is a mid-size crossover utility vehicle made by Hanteng Autos from 2016 to 2021. == History and Features == The Hanteng X7 was launched in 2016 its the first ever vehicle from Hanteng. it has a 1.5 and 2.0liter both turbo gasoline engines that are sourced from Mitsubishi made in the Chinese market by the Shenyang-Mitsubishi engine-making joint venture. with a 5-speed manual transmission and a 6-speed DCT transmission. It had a sportier version called Hanteng X7S and a Plug-in hybrid version called Hanteng X7 PHEV launched at the Guangzhou Auto Show in 2017 these two versions to differ from the standard version have redesigned front bumpers. == Markets == The Hanteng X7 was sold mainly in the Chinese Market during its entire production and was also made and sold locally in Iran. == Discontinuation == The production of the Hanteng X7 ended in 2021 and was discontinued without sucessor. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles
title: Hanteng X7
